entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 06:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
